episodes.title: 'Holy Sh*t, We’re in a Cult!'
episodes.description:
How do well-meaning, intelligent people end up in a cult?

EnlightenNext was an organization, founded by self-styled guru Andrew Cohen, that aimed to facilitate spiritual awakening. Cohen’s most devoted students meditated for hours—at times, months—on end, were often celibate, and lived together. However, what started as an idealistic venture quickly turned into a complicated, sinister world. Read more: https://www.theatlantic.com/video/index/501413/life-and-death-of-a-cult/

Subscribe to The Atlantic on YouTube: http://bit.ly/subAtlanticYT
